flawed_nl_solution:
He sold an average of 16 books per month across all 3 months so he must have sold a total of 3*16 = <<16*3=48>>48 books in those 3 months
He sold 15+16 = <<15+16=35>>35 in January and February
He must have sold 48-35 = <<48-35=13>>13 books in March
#### 13

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 31, not 35. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
